name: beachcomber.vim
summary: A light, sandy, beachy color scheme
description:
This scheme has a light sand-colored background and a colors that might remind one of the beach. Here are some pictures:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2477652354/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2476839901/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2477652186/
install_details:
On UNIX-like systems, including Mac OS X or Cygwin, put this file into ~/.vim/colors
On Windows, it should go into C:\Program Files\vim(or Vim)\vimfiles\colors (something like that)
